### findDeadCallerSavedReg() {#ae82cb5b8bd04147ce1ebe063f447c718}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static unsigned findDeadCallerSavedReg (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &amp; MBB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> &amp; MBBI, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/m68kregisterinfo">M68kRegisterInfo</a> &#42; TRI)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Return a caller-saved register that isn&#39;t live when it reaches the &quot;return&quot; instruction.

We can then pop a stack object to this register without worry about clobbering it.

Definition at line <a href="#l00139">139</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/m68k/m68kframelowering-cpp">M68kFrameLowering.cpp</a>.
